name: CrystalNetwork
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Crystal Network briefings highlight the latest news in indie filmmaking, music, apps and games. Get movie reviews, artist interviews, new music alerts and industry headlines that keeps you in the know.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
